result.execSummary:
The defendant Melyssa A Cowan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take >$500 - $5000), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Straight time. Sentence credit of 39 days were granted if imposed.

miscConds.notes: Restitution for Target of $1,726.64 and for WalMart of $268.98 and for Meijer of $542.98 to be paid as a condition of probation before costs and fees.
Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.

Submit to an AODA assessment, follow through with any treatment, counseling.  No use or possession of alcohol or illegal drugs/drug paraphernalia. Comply with random urine screens.  Maintain absolute sobriety. No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.

Cases 22CF1212, 2022CM00207, 22CM1172 were dismissed and read in.  No Contact with Target, Wal-Mart or Meijer Stores.   Follow through with any assessments, evaluations, treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
  No association with any known drug users or dealers and no contact at any place where illegal drugs are purchased, used, stored, packaged or distributed.
  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

timeConds.notes: With Huber, release for standard conditions. STAYED for use at agent's discretion.

supervisions.notes:
Straight time if imposed.
Consecutive to: Count 1

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Melyssa A Cowan

records.addlTxt: Letter from Atty. Steven Hughes advising the Office of the State Public Defender no longer represents Defendant.

Case called at 8:37 AM 
District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Melyssa A Cowan in court, in custody, with attorney Steven Hughes.    
Court conducts plea colloquy with the defendant.
Defendant enters a plea of Guilty to Counts 1 and 2.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of Counts 1 and 2.
State makes sentencing recommendations.
Defense makes sentencing recommendations.

COUNT 1
Court orders the following:
9 MONTHS JAIL
Credit time 39-days, if Revoked
SENTENCE IS STAYED.

Term of Probation:  2 YEARS
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended
Absolute Sobriety, Random U.A.s
No Use of Possession of alcohol or controlled substances w/o valid RX, or drug paraphernalia
Follow through with any assessment, evaluation, treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent
No contact with: Target, Wal-Mart, or Meijer Stores
No association with known drug users or dealers and no contact at any place where illegal drugs are purchases used, stored, packaged, or distributed

RESTITUTION:  $1,726.64 to Target and $268.98 to Wal-Mart and $542.98 to Meijer (to be paid as a condition of probation - restitution to be paid before costs or fines);
COSTS:  $268.00
DR GOD SURCHARGE:  $10.00
DNA SAMPLE AND SURCHARGE:  $250.00 
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
To be paid as a Condition of Probation.

CONDITION TIME: 45-DAYS HUBER (standard release conditions), STAYED; to be used at agent's discretion.  

Felony warnings, voting rights and firearms warnings given.
Body Armour warnings given.

COUNT 2
Court orders the following:
3 MONTHS JAIL
Sentence to run Consecutive to Count 1
SENTENCE IS STAYED.

Term of Probation:  2 YEARS
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended
Absolute Sobriety, Random U.A.s
No Use of Possession of alcohol or controlled substances w/o valid RX, or drug paraphernalia
Follow through with any assessment, evaluation, treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent
No contact with: Target, Wal-Mart, or Meijer Stores
No association with known drug users or dealers and no contact at any place where illegal drugs     are purchases used, stored, packaged, or distributed

COSTS:  $243.00
DNA SAMPLE AND SURCHARGE:  $200.00 
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
To be paid as a Condition of Probation.
